title: Freedom Fighters
text: We’re super excited to announce that Freedom Fighters, our cult-classic from 2003, will be available digitally on PC, starting today!

title: HITMAN on Stadia
text: HITMAN launches on Stadia on September 1st and we’re excited to welcome new players to the World of Assassination.

title: HITMAN 3 – Pre-order Today
text: We are excited to reveal the release date, editions, pre-order bonuses and next-gen upgrade options for HITMAN 3.

title: HITMAN 3 – Dartmoor
text: Discover the secrets of an old manor and uncover clues to solve the Thornbridge Mystery. Welcome to Dartmoor in HITMAN 3.

title: HITMAN VR: Become the Hitman
text: The team at IO Interactive share insights into HITMAN 3’s VR support and talk about what players can expect from this new way to play the game.

title: Announcing HITMAN VR
text: Play the entire World of Assassination trilogy in VR with HITMAN 3! Get up close to your targets and immerse yourself in 20+ exotic locations from around the world.

title: HITMAN arrives on STADIA
text: We’re excited to announce that the World of Assassination trilogy is coming to Stadia!

title: HITMAN 3 – The End of A Journey
text: The team at IO Interactive share insights into HITMAN 3’s development and talk about what players can expect from the game.
